item.title: Run Arista VM 4.2.2 and later version on EVE(UNL)
item.description: One of my friends did his VXLAN practices, he came to me for help because he was unable to start the Arista instance on EVE-NG. The Arista vm can be started and stuck at: Issue I did a search and found a clue in the Arista forum, the instance began to work after changed the CPU number to 2: Issue
